page.title: 20WINDYRIDGE,NAYLAND
page.content: Windyridge is a probation hostel housing up to 30 young men and women on probation for relatively minor offences.There are 19 staff,5 of whom live in the premises.Young people aged between 17-23 are sent to Windyridge 28 days before they appear in court.If they prove that they can behave and if they like the hostel they can come back for up to 12 months.If they find employment during these months they can leave.The residents are taught to drive,if they are illiterate they are given some teaching and they work on the farm.There is also facilities for learning the building trade.Before they leave they spend a few weeks in self contained units where they become accustomed to cooking and cleaning and generally caring for themselves.
